title: Taliban spokesman says 'no proof' bin Laden was responsible for 9/11 attacks
content:
1. Taliban spokesman says 'no proof' bin Laden was responsible for 9/11 attacks  The Washington Post
  2. Taliban spokesman claims no proof bin Laden behind Sept. 11 terror attacks; ‘There is no evidence’  Fox News
  3. Taliban say women will be allowed rights despite fears; no proof Bin Laden behind 9/11  NBC News
  4. Lessons from Afghanistan  The Manila Times
  5. In Taliban-Ruled Afghanistan, Al Qaeda-Linked Haqqani Network Rises to Power  The Wall Street Journal
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News

localize.title: タリバンの報道官、ビンラディンが9.11テロに関与した証拠はないと語る
塔利班发言人称 "没有证据 "证明本-拉登对9/11袭击负责
